name: Snake:Overloaded
description:
NOTE: Multiplayer and campaign game modes are currently not supported, but are currently in development. Only singleplayer is available at the moment.

Snake:Overloaded is a snake-like game, but with added features including local network server-based multiplayer, powerups, campaign mode and much more!

Controls can be custom mapped to suit you, and volume and resolution can also be customised.

Solo mode has 4 different difficulties, and you can see your highscore for each. 

If you collect a powerup, you can 'overload' the snake, increasing your movement speed and making you invulnerable to walls for a short time.

Coming soon:

  • Campaign mode (multiple levels with specific challenges against computer-controlled players)
  • Music + sfx
  • Multiplayer
  • Improved UI
